overview:
Sharp and smart person open for business opportunities here in Romania. 6 year background in civil construction, good law knowledge and very good local authorities ties. Can help in making decision for construction investment and land buying for future projects; can provide top mark engineering and management to assist you on your business; can offer upon request recommendation from all of my international clients. Best known for complete discretion in business.

For further details, do not hesitate to contact me. Currently available exclusively in Romania/Brasov area.
